title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
description: Watch this legendary fantasy masterpiece—brothers Edward and Alphonse Elric face moral dilemmas, alchemy, and epic battles in a 64‑episode journey to restore what they’ve lost.

title: Steins;Gate
description: Dive into the mind‑bending sci‑fi thriller where a geeky lab assistant accidentally invents time travel—and must rewrite fate across 24 intense episodes.

title: Cowboy Bebop
description: Blast through space in this 26‑episode neo‑noir classic—bounty hunters chase fame, fortune—and their pasts across a jazzy galaxy.

title: Attack on Titan
description: Experience humanity’s desperate fight to survive 75 episodes of epic titan battles, political intrigue, and shocking twists.

title: Naruto: Shippuden
description: Join Naruto’s epic journey across 500 episodes—packed with shinobi battles, emotional character growth, and the Akatsuki’s looming threat.

title: Your Lie in April
description: Emotional music & romance collide in this heartfelt 22‑episode tale about a piano prodigy who rediscovers life through a violinist’s song.

title: Made in Abyss
description: Experience the hauntingly beautiful adventure of a fearless girl and her robot friend in a mysterious abyss across 13 gripping episodes.

title: Mob Psycho 100
description: Follow a powerful psychic teen battling spirits and his own emotions in this 25‑episode action‑comedy sensation.

title: One Piece
description: Set sail on an epic pirate adventure spanning 1,126+ episodes—this ongoing fantasy series is filled with high-seas adventure, unforgettable characters, and powerful story arcs.

title: Death Note
description: Enter a thrilling cat-and-mouse game between a genius detective and a teen with a deathly notebook—complete in just 37 gripping episodes.
